General.Name: EcoFirst Consolidated Bhd
General.Description: EcoFirst Consolidated Bhd, an investment holding company, engages in the property development and construction, investment, and management businesses in Malaysia. The company operates through four segments: Property Development; Property Investment; Property Management; and Investment and Others. It develops residential units, commercial centers, and retail malls, as well as invests in and manages shopping malls. The company also offers business management consultancy services; and operates agriculture related businesses. EcoFirst Consolidated Bhd was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
General.Address: A-19, Menara Allianz Sentral, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, 50470
